title: Child-and-Parents Relationship Change History Get
description: How to get the change history for a child-and-parents relationship.

response.body:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<feed xmlns:gx="http://gedcomx.org/v1/" xmlns:fs="http://familysearch.org/v1/" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom">
    <id>uuid:ac5ffaa9-5c5d-4249-98ef-fce24af410e9</id>
    <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/child-and-parents-relationships/PC12-345" rel="child-and-parents" title="Child-and-Parents Relationship"/>
    <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/child-and-parents-relationships/PC12-345/changes" rel="self" title="Child-and-Parents Relationship Change History"/>
    <title>Change History for Parent Relationship Pair PC12-345</title>
    <updated>2013-05-14T21:15:03.437Z</updated>
    <entry>
        <fs:changeInfo objectType="http://familysearch.org/v1/CoupleChildRelationship" operation="http://familysearch.org/v1/Create" reason="because it was necessary"/>
        <contributor>
            <name>Mr. Contributor</name>
        </contributor>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/users/agents/UKMGTY" rel="agent"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/changes/183893/restore" rel="restore" title="Restore Change"/>
        <title>Child and Parents Relationship Created</title>
        <updated>2013-05-14T21:15:03.440Z</updated>
    </entry>
    <entry>
        <fs:changeInfo objectModifier="http://familysearch.org/v1/ChildAndParentsRelationship" objectType="http://gedcomx.org/Fact" operation="http://familysearch.org/v1/Create" reason="because it was necessary"/>
        <contributor>
            <name>Mr. Contributor</name>
        </contributor>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/users/agents/UKMGTY" rel="agent"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/changes/130709/restore" rel="restore" title="Restore Change"/>
        <title>Lineage Added</title>
        <updated>2013-05-14T21:15:03.446Z</updated>
    </entry>
    <entry>
        <fs:changeInfo objectType="http://familysearch.org/v1/CoupleChildRelationship" operation="http://familysearch.org/v1/Delete" reason="because it was necessary"/>
        <contributor>
            <name>Mr. Contributor</name>
        </contributor>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/users/agents/UKMGTY" rel="agent"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/changes/176382/restore" rel="restore" title="Restore Change"/>
        <title>Child and Parents Relationship Removed</title>
        <updated>2013-05-14T21:15:03.447Z</updated>
    </entry>
</feed>
